00116 extern "C" __declspec(dllimport) void __stdcall OutputDebugStringA(char const *text);

00119 inline void DzWarning(const char *file, unsigned line, QString const &text)
00120 {   
00121 #if defined(Q_OS_WIN) && defined(_DEBUG)
00122 #pragma comment(lib, "kernel32.lib")
00123     QString message = QString("%1(%2): %3\n").arg(file).arg(line).arg(text);
00124     QByteArray messageBytes = message.toAscii();
00125     OutputDebugStringA(messageBytes.constData());
00126 #else
00127     QString fileName = QString::fromLatin1(file);
00128     
00129 #if defined(Q_OS_MAC)
00130     static const QString c_src = QString::fromLatin1("/src/");
00131     int srcIdx = fileName.lastIndexOf(c_src,-1,Qt::CaseInsensitive);
00132     if( srcIdx > 0 ){
00133         fileName = fileName.mid(srcIdx);
00134     }
00135 #endif
00136 
00137     QString message = QString("%1(%2): %3").arg(fileName).arg(line).arg(text);
00138     QByteArray messageBytes = message.toAscii();
00139     qWarning("%s", messageBytes.constData());
00140 #endif
00141 }
00142 #define DZ_WARNING(text_) DzWarning(__FILE__, __LINE__, text_)

00152 inline void DzConnect(const QObject *sender, const char *signal,
00153                         const QObject *receiver, const char *member)
00154 {
00155     bool result = QObject::connect(sender,signal,receiver,member);
00156     assert(result && "QObject connection failed");
00157 }
00158 
00163 inline void DzConnect(const QObject *sender, const char *signal,
00164                         const QObject *receiver, const char *member,Qt::ConnectionType connectionType)
00165 {
00166     bool result = QObject::connect(sender,signal,receiver,member,connectionType);
00167     assert(result && "QObject connection failed");
00168 }

00170 /*****************************
00171     Required platform abstractions
00172 *****************************/
00173 // Define the things that will handle DLL symbols on Windows platforms.
00174 #if defined( DZ_NO_EXPORT )
00175 #   define DZ_EXPORT
00176 #elif defined( Q_OS_WIN )
00177 #   ifdef DZ_MAKEDLL // Create a DLL library
00178 #       define DZ_EXPORT __declspec(dllexport)
00179 #   else    // Use a DLL library
00180 #       define DZ_EXPORT __declspec(dllimport)
00181 #   endif
00182 #elif defined( Q_OS_MAC )
00183 #   ifdef DZ_MAKEDLL // Create a DLL library
00184 #       define DZ_EXPORT __attribute__((visibility("default")))
00185 #   else    // Use a DLL library
00186 #       define DZ_EXPORT
00187 #   endif
00188 #else
00189 #   define DZ_EXPORT
00190 #endif

00216 template <typename T>
00217 bool dzIsA( const QObject *obj )
00218 {
00219     if( !obj )
00220         return false;
00221 
00222     return (strcmp( T::staticMetaObject.className(), obj->metaObject()->className() ) == 0);
00223 }
